posts.title: Guess Number
posts.content: Simple game of guess number with arbitrary upper bound.

posts.title: Semantic Versioning
posts.content: Implementation of Semantic Versioning, as specified by semver.org. The module provides the following functionality: A convenient data type for semantic versions, in which major, minor, patch, pre-release, and metadata can all be separately accessed.A way to parse semver strings (the strings described in the specification into your semver data type. A way to convert your semver data type into semver strings. Comparison functions or operators that implement precedence, as described in the specification.In particular, two versions should be equal if and only if they have equal precedence.

posts.title: Bubble Sort
posts.content: Bubble Sort is a simple sorting algorithm, comparing adjacent elements and swapping if out of order. Average case Big O (n^2),Best Case Big O (n)(sorted).

posts.title: Primality Test
posts.content: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself. I implemented a simple test, to determine if a number is prime. I will expand on optimization and proof around this test down the line.

posts.title: Fibonacci Numbers
posts.content: The Fibonacci numbers are numbers characterized by the fact that every number after the first two is the sum of the two preceding ones.

posts.title: Rational Arithmetic
posts.content: A rational number is any number that can be expressed as the quotient or fraction p/q of two integers, p and q, with the denominator q, not equal to zero. This project demonstrates simple arithmetic with user input and demonstrates overloaded operators and class use.
